name: Color Chaos - The Colorfully Bland Bungle Invasion
name_original: Color Chaos - The Colorfully Bland Bungle Invasion
description:
A game made for the GCO SDSU itch.io game jam of June, 2017. It was made from scratch in less than 24 hours, including voice acting, writing, design, artwork, and programming. While I tried to test for and fix most bugs, it's not perfect.

The mischievous race known as the Bungles has invaded this unnamed planet. They have attacked the source of the world's color, turning everything to black and white! It's up to you, unnamed hero, to step in and save the day.

Most puzzles have multiple ways to solve them, so get creative!

Known bugs: Occasionally the Bungles at the end will suddenly stop buzzing 

CONTROLS: WASD to move, X to skip cutscene/dialogue, space to jump, escape to pause, left-click for primary fire, right-click for secondary fire, R to reset

Music by Kevin MacLeod

Programming, modeling, design, art, and sound effects by Connor (AnonymousIndie)

Voice acting by Peter (Bungles) and Nate (Gurbo)

Powered by Unreal Engine 4.
